downloadTitle: Introduction to Microsoft Teams Android devices - Module 1
downloadDescription: Learn about Microsoft Teams Android personal and shared devices and understand the device requirements.

downloadFile.name: Module 1 - Introduction to Microsoft Teams Android Devices.pptx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/a/e/0/ae0facd5-6956-494d-8357-d8b5b363dbef/Module 1 - Introduction to Microsoft Teams Android Devices.pptx

detailsSection: Hybrid work is here to stay and it is imperative that we provide solutions that enhance productivity with personal devices and address individual device needs. Teams provides a familiar, consistent experience when users move across these spaces from home to work and vice versa.
detailsSection_file_name: Module 1 - Introduction to Microsoft Teams Android Devices.pptx
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file or find the file on your device and open it.
